term.Name: title
term.Label: Title
term.Definition: A name given to the resource.
term.Note: In current practice, this term is used primarily with literal values; however, there are important uses with non-literal values as well. As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is leaving this range unspecified pending an investigation of options.

term.Name: creator
term.Label: Creator
term.Definition: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.
term.Comment: Examples of a Creator include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Creator should be used to indicate the entity.

term.Name: subject
term.Label: Subject
term.Definition: The topic of the resource.
term.Comment: Typically, the subject will be represented using keywords, key phrases, or classification codes. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary. To describe the spatial or temporal topic of the resource, use the Coverage element.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: description
term.Label: Description
term.Definition: An account of the resource.
term.Comment: Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

term.Name: publisher
term.Label: Publisher
term.Definition: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
term.Comment: Examples of a Publisher include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Publisher should be used to indicate the entity.

term.Name: contributor
term.Label: Contributor
term.Definition: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
term.Comment: Examples of a Contributor include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Contributor should be used to indicate the entity.

term.Name: date
term.Label: Date
term.Definition: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.
term.Comment: Date may be used to express temporal information at any level of granularity. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as the W3CDTF profile of ISO 8601 [W3CDTF].

term.Name: type
term.Label: Type
term.Definition: The nature or genre of the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the DCMI Type Vocabulary [DCMITYPE]. To describe the file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource, use the Format element.

term.Name: format
term.Label: Format
term.Definition: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.
term.Comment: Examples of dimensions include size and duration. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the list of Internet Media Types [MIME].

term.Name: identifier
term.Label: Identifier
term.Definition: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to identify the resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

term.Name: source
term.Label: Source
term.Definition: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.
term.Comment: The described resource may be derived from the related resource in whole or in part. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: language
term.Label: Language
term.Definition: A language of the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as RFC 4646 [RFC4646].

term.Name: relation
term.Label: Relation
term.Definition: A related resource.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: coverage
term.Label: Coverage
term.Definition: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant.
term.Comment: Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

term.Name: rights
term.Label: Rights
term.Definition: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
term.Comment: Typically, rights information includes a statement about various property rights associated with the resource, including intellectual property rights.

term.Name: audience
term.Label: Audience
term.Definition: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful.

term.Name: audience
term.Label: Audience
term.Definition: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful.
term.Comment: A class of entity may be determined by the creator or the publisher or by a third party.

term.Name: audience
term.Label: Audience
term.Definition: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful.
term.Comment: A class of entity may be determined by the creator or the publisher or by a third party.

term.Name: alternative
term.Label: Alternative Title
term.Definition: An alternative name for the resource.
term.Comment: The distinction between titles and alternative titles is application-specific.
term.Note: In current practice, this term is used primarily with literal values; however, there are important uses with non-literal values as well. As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is leaving this range unspecified pending an investigation of options.

term.Name: alternative
term.Label: Alternative
term.Definition: Any form of the title used as a substitute or alternative to the formal title of the resource.
term.Comment: This qualifier can include Title abbreviations as well as translations.

term.Name: alternative
term.Label: Alternative
term.Definition: Any form of the title used as a substitute or alternative to the formal title of the resource.
term.Comment: This qualifier can include Title abbreviations as well as translations.

term.Name: tableOfContents
term.Label: Table Of Contents
term.Definition: A list of subunits of the resource.

term.Name: tableOfContents
term.Label: Table Of Contents
term.Definition: A list of subunits of the content of the resource.

term.Name: tableOfContents
term.Label: Table Of Contents
term.Definition: A list of subunits of the content of the resource.

term.Name: abstract
term.Label: Abstract
term.Definition: A summary of the resource.

term.Name: abstract
term.Label: Abstract
term.Definition: A summary of the content of the resource.

term.Name: abstract
term.Label: Abstract
term.Definition: A summary of the content of the resource.

term.Name: created
term.Label: Date Created
term.Definition: Date of creation of the resource.

term.Name: created
term.Label: Created
term.Definition: Date of creation of the resource.

term.Name: created
term.Label: Created
term.Definition: Date of creation of the resource.

term.Name: valid
term.Label: Date Valid
term.Definition: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

term.Name: valid
term.Label: Valid
term.Definition: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

term.Name: valid
term.Label: Valid
term.Definition: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

term.Name: available
term.Label: Date Available
term.Definition: Date (often a range) that the resource became or will become available.

term.Name: available
term.Label: Available
term.Definition: Date (often a range) that the resource will become or did become available.

term.Name: available
term.Label: Available
term.Definition: Date (often a range) that the resource will become or did become available.

term.Name: issued
term.Label: Date Issued
term.Definition: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

term.Name: issued
term.Label: Issued
term.Definition: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

term.Name: issued
term.Label: Issued
term.Definition: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

term.Name: modified
term.Label: Date Modified
term.Definition: Date on which the resource was changed.

term.Name: modified
term.Label: Modified
term.Definition: Date on which the resource was changed.

term.Name: modified
term.Label: Modified
term.Definition: Date on which the resource was changed.

term.Name: extent
term.Label: Extent
term.Definition: The size or duration of the resource.

term.Name: extent
term.Label: Extent
term.Definition: The size or duration of the resource.

term.Name: extent
term.Label: Extent
term.Definition: The size or duration of the resource.

term.Name: medium
term.Label: Medium
term.Definition: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

term.Name: medium
term.Label: Medium
term.Definition: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

term.Name: medium
term.Label: Medium
term.Definition: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

term.Name: isVersionOf
term.Label: Is Version Of
term.Definition: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.
term.Comment: Changes in version imply substantive changes in content rather than differences in format.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isVersionOf
term.Label: Is Version Of
term.Definition: The described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation of the referenced resource. Changes in version imply substantive changes in content rather than differences in format.

term.Name: isVersionOf
term.Label: Is Version Of
term.Definition: The described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation of the referenced resource. Changes in version imply substantive changes in content rather than differences in format.

term.Name: hasVersion
term.Label: Has Version
term.Definition: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: hasVersion
term.Label: Has Version
term.Definition: The described resource has a version, edition, or adaptation, namely, the referenced resource.

term.Name: hasVersion
term.Label: Has Version
term.Definition: The described resource has a version, edition, or adaptation, namely, the referenced resource.

term.Name: isReplacedBy
term.Label: Is Replaced By
term.Definition: A related resource that supplants, displaces, or supersedes the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isReplacedBy
term.Label: Is Replaced By
term.Definition: The described resource is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the referenced resource.

term.Name: isReplacedBy
term.Label: Is Replaced By
term.Definition: The described resource is supplanted, displaced, or superceded by the referenced resource.

term.Name: replaces
term.Label: Replaces
term.Definition: A related resource that is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: replaces
term.Label: Replaces
term.Definition: The described resource supplants, displaces, or supersedes the referenced resource.

term.Name: replaces
term.Label: Replaces
term.Definition: The described resource supplants, displaces, or supersedes the referenced resource.

term.Name: isRequiredBy
term.Label: Is Required By
term.Definition: A related resource that requires the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isRequiredBy
term.Label: Is Required By
term.Definition: The described resource is required by the referenced resource, either physically or logically.

term.Name: isRequiredBy
term.Label: Is Required By
term.Definition: The described resource is required by the referenced resource, either physically or logically.

term.Name: requires
term.Label: Requires
term.Definition: A related resource that is required by the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: requires
term.Label: Requires
term.Definition: The described resource requires the referenced resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence of content.

term.Name: requires
term.Label: Requires
term.Definition: The described resource requires the referenced resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence of content.

term.Name: isPartOf
term.Label: Is Part Of
term.Definition: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isPartOf
term.Label: Is Part Of
term.Definition: The described resource is a physical or logical part of the referenced resource.

term.Name: isPartOf
term.Label: Is Part Of
term.Definition: The described resource is a physical or logical part of the referenced resource.

term.Name: hasPart
term.Label: Has Part
term.Definition: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: hasPart
term.Label: Has Part
term.Definition: The described resource includes the referenced resource either physically or logically.

term.Name: hasPart
term.Label: Has Part
term.Definition: The described resource includes the referenced resource either physically or logically.

term.Name: isReferencedBy
term.Label: Is Referenced By
term.Definition: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isReferencedBy
term.Label: Is Referenced By
term.Definition: The described resource is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the referenced resource.

term.Name: isReferencedBy
term.Label: Is Referenced By
term.Definition: The described resource is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the referenced resource.

term.Name: references
term.Label: References
term.Definition: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: references
term.Label: References
term.Definition: The described resource references, cites, or otherwise points to the referenced resource.

term.Name: references
term.Label: References
term.Definition: The described resource references, cites, or otherwise points to the referenced resource.

term.Name: isFormatOf
term.Label: Is Format Of
term.Definition: A related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: isFormatOf
term.Label: Is Format Of
term.Definition: The described resource is the same intellectual content of the referenced resource, but presented in another format.

term.Name: isFormatOf
term.Label: Is Format Of
term.Definition: The described resource is the same intellectual content of the referenced resource, but presented in another format.

term.Name: hasFormat
term.Label: Has Format
term.Definition: A related resource that is substantially the same as the pre-existing described resource, but in another format.
term.Note: This term is intended to be used with non-literal values as defined in the DCMI Abstract Model (http://dublincore.org/documents/abstract-model/). As of December 2007, the DCMI Usage Board is seeking a way to express this intention with a formal range declaration.

term.Name: hasFormat
term.Label: Has Format
term.Definition: The described resource pre-existed the referenced resource, which is essentially the same intellectual content presented in another format.

term.Name: hasFormat
term.Label: Has Format
term.Definition: The described resource pre-existed the referenced resource, which is essentially the same intellectual content presented in another format.

term.Name: conformsTo
term.Label: Conforms To
term.Definition: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

term.Name: conformsTo
term.Label: Conforms To
term.Definition: A reference to an established standard to which the resource conforms.

term.Name: conformsTo
term.Label: Conforms To
term.Definition: A reference to an established standard to which the resource conforms.

term.Name: spatial
term.Label: Spatial Coverage
term.Definition: Spatial characteristics of the resource.

term.Name: spatial
term.Label: Spatial
term.Definition: Spatial characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource.

term.Name: spatial
term.Label: Spatial
term.Definition: Spatial characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource.

term.Name: temporal
term.Label: Temporal Coverage
term.Definition: Temporal characteristics of the resource.

term.Name: temporal
term.Label: Temporal
term.Definition: Temporal characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource.

term.Name: temporal
term.Label: Temporal
term.Definition: Temporal characteristics of the intellectual content of the resource.

term.Name: mediator
term.Label: Mediator
term.Definition: An entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful.
term.Comment: In an educational context, a mediator might be a parent, teacher, teaching assistant, or care-giver.

term.Name: mediator
term.Label: Mediator
term.Definition: A class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful.
term.Comment: The audiences for a resource are of two basic classes: (1) an ultimate beneficiary of the resource, and (2) frequently, an entity that mediates access to the resource. The mediator element refinement represents the second of these two classes.

term.Name: mediator
term.Label: Mediator
term.Definition: A class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful.
term.Comment: The audience for a resource in the education/training domain are of two basic classes: (1) an ultimate beneficiary of the resource (usually a student or trainee), and (2) frequently, an entity that mediates access to the resource (usually a teacher or trainer). The mediator element refinement represents the second of these two classes.

term.Name: dateAccepted
term.Label: Date Accepted
term.Definition: Date of acceptance of the resource.
term.Comment: Examples of resources to which a Date Accepted may be relevant are a thesis (accepted by a university department) or an article (accepted by a journal).

term.Name: dateAccepted
term.Label: Date Accepted
term.Definition: Date of acceptance of the resource (e.g. of thesis by university department, of article by journal, etc.).

term.Name: dateCopyrighted
term.Label: Date Copyrighted
term.Definition: Date of copyright.

term.Name: dateCopyrighted
term.Label: Date Copyrighted
term.Definition: Date of a statement of copyright.

term.Name: dateSubmitted
term.Label: Date Submitted
term.Definition: Date of submission of the resource.
term.Comment: Examples of resources to which a Date Submitted may be relevant are a thesis (submitted to a university department) or an article (submitted to a journal).

term.Name: dateSubmitted
term.Label: Date Submitted
term.Definition: Date of submission of the resource (e.g. thesis, articles, etc.).

term.Name: educationLevel
term.Label: Audience Education Level
term.Definition: A class of entity, defined in terms of progression through an educational or training context, for which the described resource is intended.

term.Name: educationLevel
term.Label: Audience Education Level
term.Definition: A general statement describing the education or training context. Alternatively, a more specific statement of the location of the audience in terms of its progression through an education or training context.

term.Name: accessRights
term.Label: Access Rights
term.Definition: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.
term.Comment: Access Rights may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

term.Name: accessRights
term.Label: Access Rights
term.Definition: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.
term.Comment: Access Rights may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security or other regulations.

term.Name: bibliographicCitation
term.Label: Bibliographic Citation
term.Definition: A bibliographic reference for the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended practice is to include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible.

term.Name: bibliographicCitation
term.Label: Bibliographic Citation
term.Definition: A bibliographic reference for the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended practice is to include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible, whether or not the citation is in a standard form.

term.Name: license
term.Label: License
term.Definition: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

term.Name: license
term.Label: License
term.Definition: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to identify the license using a URI. Examples of such licenses can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/.

term.Name: rightsHolder
term.Label: Rights Holder
term.Definition: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

term.Name: rightsHolder
term.Label: Rights Holder
term.Definition: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use the URI or name of the Rights Holder to indicate the entity.

term.Name: provenance
term.Label: Provenance
term.Definition: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.
term.Comment: The statement may include a description of any changes successive custodians made to the resource.

term.Name: provenance
term.Label: Provenance
term.Definition: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity and interpretation.
term.Comment: The statement may include a description of any changes successive custodians made to the resource.

term.Name: instructionalMethod
term.Label: Instructional Method
term.Definition: A process, used to engender knowledge, attitudes and skills, that the described resource is designed to support.
term.Comment: Instructional Method will typically include ways of presenting instructional materials or conducting instructional activities, patterns of learner-to-learner and learner-to-instructor interactions, and mechanisms by which group and individual levels of learning are measured. Instructional methods include all aspects of the instruction and learning processes from planning and implementation through evaluation and feedback.

term.Name: instructionalMethod
term.Label: Instructional Method
term.Definition: A process, used to engender knowledge, attitudes and skills, that the resource is designed to support.
term.Comment: Instructional Method will typically include ways of presenting instructional materials or conducting instructional activities, patterns of learner-to-learner and learner-to-instructor interactions, and mechanisms by which group and individual levels of learning are measured. Instructional methods include all aspects of the instruction and learning processes from planning and implementation through evaluation and feedback.

term.Name: accrualMethod
term.Label: Accrual Method
term.Definition: The method by which items are added to a collection.

term.Name: accrualMethod
term.Label: Accrual Method
term.Definition: The method by which items are added to a collection.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use a value from a controlled vocabulary.

term.Name: accrualPeriodicity
term.Label: Accrual Periodicity
term.Definition: The frequency with which items are added to a collection.

term.Name: accrualPeriodicity
term.Label: Accrual Periodicity
term.Definition: The frequency with which items are added to a collection.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use a value from a controlled vocabulary.

term.Name: accrualPolicy
term.Label: Accrual Policy
term.Definition: The policy governing the addition of items to a collection.

term.Name: accrualPolicy
term.Label: Accrual Policy
term.Definition: The policy governing the addition of items to a collection.
term.Comment: Recommended best practice is to use a value from a controlled vocabulary.
